amendment.description: Amendment strikes a policy provision relating to freezing Space Station management responsibilities; clarifies the range of scientific data which NASA may acquire from commercial data providers; and perfects the language of the Unitary Wind Tunnel Plan Act of 1949 to include hypersonic speeds. \ As amended by the Cramer amendment (A002) language was added to fund business facilitators under the commcercial technology program within NASA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 6 in the Congressional Record of April 23, 1997, to strike section 130, the Space Station Program Responsibilities Transfer Limitation and to make certain technical corrections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A001) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
